data.title: Request to Show Your Art in a City Gallery
data.meta_description: The city offers three gallery spaces to expose artwork for regional artists.
data.text:
Step 3.Gather your materials

To be considered, you will need to submit a checklist of your work that includes labeled photos with each with a thumbnail image, title, year, media and dimensions (height by width in inches).

Example: Jane A. Doe, Waiting for a Bus, 2018, acrylic on canvas.

An insured value amount should be included per piece of artwork for the City of Orlando's insurance coverage while in the care of the city.

All labels, wall text, vinyls for title of exhibit will be supplied, paid for and formatted by Public Art. If there is an exception, we will let you know.

Step 4.Submit your application to be considered

The best way to send us your portfolio is through a link to your website or through a file-sharing website. Below is the application form to provide us with this.

All exhibitions are curated and planned two years in advance. We will contact you if you are selected.

Submit Your Application

Step 3.Gather your materials

To be considered, you will need to submit a checklist of your work that includes labeled photos with each with a thumbnail image, title, year, media and dimensions (height by width in inches).

Example: Jane A. Doe, Waiting for a Bus, 2018, acrylic on canvas.

An insured value amount should be included per piece of artwork for the City of Orlando's insurance coverage while in the care of the city.

All labels, wall text, vinyls for title of exhibit will be supplied, paid for and formatted by Public Art. If there is an exception, we will let you know.

Step 4.Send us your work to be considered

Please mail us a CD with at least 30 examples of wall-ready work of art. The art must specify its medium and each of its dimensions. Also include your name, email, phone number and address in your package.

Mail to:

Charles (Keith) Beasley, Public Art Coordinator

City Hall

PO Box 4990

Orlando, FL 32801

All exhibitions are curated and planned two years in advance. We will contact you if you are selected.
